uk.ac.leeds.ccg.geotools.classification
Class Bin

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--uk.ac.leeds.ccg.geotools.classification.Bin
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
public class Bin
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable

A bin specifies a range of values between two doubles. The range is specified as including everyting from the lower value, which is itself included, through to anything smaller than the higher value, which is not itself included in the range. Bins can be produced by hand but their most comon source a Classifier object which will automaticaly produce bins from sets of numbers.

Version:
0.1
Author:
jamesm
See Also:

contains

public boolean contains(double value)
Tests the specified value to see if it falls inside the range of the Bin.
Parameters:
value - The value to test for containment.
Returns:
boolean true only if value >= lowerInclusion AND < upperExclusion if value = lowerInclusion = upperExclusion value is considerd to be contained
